items.value: Drinking alcohol doesn't make you smarter, but it helps keeping the body warm.
Equipping a cool begging sign grants your begging a much higher succes rate.
Your bowels are getting full and you need to empty yourself. The more you procrastinate the worse for your health.
Your bowels are definitely full and you need to empty yourself. The more you procrastinate the worse for your health.
Ok, you really, REALLY have to empty yourself...NOW! The more you procrastinate the worse for your health.
It doesn't look like breaking that door is something even barely legal. At all.
You've been caught red handed and somebody saw your face. You're wanted for an hour.
The effects clothings have on your perceived ambient temperature.
You've been hit badly by the tough arm of law. You have difficulties moving unless properly treated.
You're holding a crowbar in your hands. You can use it to break things.
You feel definitely too hot. Your body is suffering and you need to cool it down.
You fled from a bribery and you got a lot of scandal on yourself!
You got intoxicated from eating something not good. You're going to pass a bad moment unless properly treated.
Some food you can eat will have an impact on your perceived temperature.
Ok, no joke. You almost froze...
Gastro Boy is useful for treating gastric illnesses and intoxications.
Wearing hats can impact on your perceived temperature.
Too much sun and nothing to cover yourself can bring lots of problems to your health.
Too hot. You need to cool yourself as your not comfortable at all.
It's too cold for you and you need to cover yourself to regain some warmt.
Strolling naked in the streets is the fastest way to get yourself a one-way ticket to coplandia.
Picking pockets and being caught red-handed is gonna cause you some great troubles with the law.
Being exposed to rain will affect your perceived temperature.
Breaking through doors and shops is not considered an adequate behaviour.
Scandalizing civilians with behaviours contrary to the public decency and decorum will not be tolerated.
Such actions are repressed as contrary to the public decency.
Being exposed to snow affect your perceived temperature.
Being exposed to a storm severely affects your perceived temperature.
Searching in the trash is considered agains the common laws of public decency.
Washing in public and exposing personal bodyparts is considered an offence to public decency.
Harvesting berries is forbidden as it is a theft against public property.
Umbrella protects you against atmospheric agents such rain or heat.
Washing up without heating or warm water greatly affects your perceived temperature.

Equipped with such a fishing pole you look like you're ready to go fishing.
So go, fish.
Good luck with that.
Take big fishes, uh!?!
Frequenting places such as sewers and other stinky holes is going to affect the way you smell and look to others.
You are so hungry you feel like you're about to die. Or maybe you are REALLY about to die. Eat something fast to save your life.
You feel moderately hungry. You should eat something as soon as possible to save your health.

Everywhere you look you see food.
Everywhere you smell it's the scent of it.
Your are EXTREMELY tired. You have to find a bed to sleep as soon as possible if you want to save your health.
You are getting tired, and you'd better be doing something about it.
You are about to finish your energies. You should rest as soon as possible or you wont be able to sprint anymore.

HAve you ever stoppeed to think about how IS the universe copareed...
I mean if you compare it. You know what I mean?
If I compare it to the infinitely small worldl made of billions of atoms just, you know, stuffed in a single speck of dust?
It's like stars, like a fraking starfield!

Scabies is a contagious skin disease. It is caused mainly by the mite Sarcoptes scabiei, a very small and usually not directly visible parasite, which is inoculated under the skin of the affected subject causing intense allergic itching.
You can get scabies by sleeping on the ground or on improvised beds and by letting your personal hygiene fall to a low level.
Your personal hygiene status is the worst ever. You really need to do something about it or you're gonna catch some terrible disease and you will not live long.
Your stink like someone who could really get a shower. Or a bath at the sea. Or could help himself with some city fountain.
You should think about washing yourself sooner or later,uh?
Staying close to the firebin makes you feel warmer.
Those scumbags are gonna beat the shit out of yourself if the can get their hands on you!
Could you help me? Police on my back. They will catch me. If I dare drop back. Won't you give me, all the speed I lack?
A very basic stove made up of metal scraps and other junk. Does not warm so much indeed.
A quite good stove, crafted out of metal scraps and other junk. It's not the best stuff out there but good enough, for good's sake.
Listening to good music is good for your soul and for your stamina.
There's nothing like a punk gig to have some socialization. Just pay attention to the pogo. Don't get hurt.
Try to sneak and jump over that metro passage fence? It turns out you're not in good shape as you were once!
You have a screwdriver equipped in your hands. Just wonder what you could do with that.
you are a real Business Man!
you are protected from Scabydoo Illness!
